amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 115-785 to reduce Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide by $1,000,000 and increases it by the same to be used for explosive ordnance disposal equipment upgrades and technology enhancements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Crawford.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
